name: voltage-schema
description: The analytics schema that evolves with your software.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && tsc && mkdir -p dist/schemas/defaults && cp src/schemas/*.schema.json dist/schemas/ && cp src/schemas/defaults/*.default.json dist/schemas/defaults/ && cp src/tracker.ts dist/tracker.ts && cp src/types.ts dist/types.ts

author: Matthew Rheault
